net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader

Interface ResourceReaderHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResourceBrowser, WorkingDirectoryLocationAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServletContextResourceReaderHandler

    public interface ResourceReaderHandler
extends WorkingDirectoryLocationAware, ResourceBrowser
    Interface implemented by objects, which can manage resource readers.
    Author:
    Ibrahim Chaehoi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResourceReaderToEnd(ResourceReader rd)
      Adds the resource reader to the end of the list of available readers
      void addResourceReaderToStart(ResourceReader rd)
      Adds the resource reader to the beginning of the list of available readers
      Reader getResource(String resourceName)
      Retrieves a single resource.
      Reader getResource(String resourceName, boolean processingBundle)
      Retrieves a single resource.

      Retrieves a single resource.
      InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourceName)
      Retrieves the input stream of a resource defined in the web application.
      InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourceName, boolean processingBundle)
      Retrieves the input stream of a resource defined in the web application.
      String getWorkingDirectory()
      Returns the Jawr working directory
